Instructions: Raise a ticket using 'GC Oracle (Unity) User Set Up' or 'User Job Change' via My Connect.
Rationale: Ensures proper user credentials and security protocols for global regions.

Instructions: Raise a ticket using 'GC Oracle EBS Application Issues' via My Connect.
Rationale: Provides technical support for system-specific errors.

Instructions: Access worksheets via Americas (AC prod), APAC, and EMEA/AIS production region links.
Rationale: Centralizes order management tools for global business units.

Instructions: 1. Select the line in error. 2. Press 'Get Cost'. 3. Refresh and press 'Book' to finalize.
Rationale: Resolves 'Line does not have Buy Price Basis And/Or Business Cost' alerts.

Instructions: If 'Get Cost' fails, contact the Buyer via Salesforce using the 'SO: WEB-SO*****, Part Num.:, Qty: **pcs' template.
Rationale: Required when the system cannot automatically retrieve a valid price; requires manual intervention from Marketing.

Instructions: 1. Search order in Navision copy mailbox (Outlook). 2. Go to 'Line Item Details' in Unity and select ship method and account number matching order confirmation.
Rationale: Ensures correct logistics and billing for customer-provided shipping accounts.

Instructions: 1. Click 'Book'. 2. If 'Hard credit check hold' appears, notify customer via 'CRERDITHOLD' canned email and CC the assigned collector.
Rationale: Prevents order booking for customers with finance/credit issues until cleared.

Instructions: Search using V90 warehouse code and 'Not released to warehouse' status. Click '+' to see components.
Rationale: Ensures visibility of all components in complex Build-to-Order items.

Instructions: Check 'Line Item Details' for workorder generation. If build has started, items are NCNR (Non-Cancelable/Non-Returnable).
Rationale: Protects inventory costs for customized component builds.

Instructions: Ensure orders are received (booked) and expedited to destination within 24 hours.
Rationale: Maintains global shipping efficiency even when no alerts are present.

Instructions: 1. Inform supplier using 'POSHORTSHIP'. 2. Amend QTY in Unity. 3. Inform customer using 'SHORTSHIP'. 4. Complete refund.
Rationale: Manages customer expectations and inventory accuracy for incomplete deliveries.

Instructions: 1. Inform supplier of extra qty. 2. Create Stand-Alone PO to receive extra items. 3. Request RMA for over-shipment.
Rationale: Corrects system inventory when suppliers send more parts than ordered.

Instructions: 1. Inform supplier and customer via canned email. 2. Cancel the order. 3. Complete refund. 4. Request RMA from supplier.
Rationale: Standardizes return and refund process for non-conforming goods.

Instructions: Check with warehouse if HAZMAT can be sent to ship-to address. If not, inform supplier/customer, cancel order, and refund.
Rationale: Ensures adherence to safety and transport regulations for hazardous materials.

Instructions: Raise IT ticket under 'Digital Issue' section with warehouse details. Delete backorder alerts after IT check.
Rationale: Generates a new Delivery ID (DID) if the warehouse management system fails.

Instructions: If stock available: Book order and select 'Do not send email'. If no stock: Follow stockout process.
Rationale: Controls customer notifications based on real-time stock availability in EMEA.

Instructions: 1. Send 'PARTIALA' canned email to customer. 2. If accepted, change quantity in both systems. If rejected, cancel and refund.
Rationale: Manages customer flexibility when orders cannot be fully fulfilled.

Instructions: Copy the value from 'Cost' field to 'Resale' field until the margin is 0.
Rationale: Ensures intercompany orders are processed with 0 margin per policy.

Instructions: If system doesn't auto-remove alerts in 24hrs, contact globalhtsclassification@arrow.com.
Rationale: Clears legal holds preventing international shipping.

Instructions: If tracking is posted but QTY billed = 0, contact supplier for invoice info. Follow up in 1-2 days.
Rationale: Ensures final billing and closure of third-party drop-shipment orders.

Instructions: If no FS PO placed within 48hrs of booking, email Asset Manager to place buy.
Rationale: Initiates inventory replenishment for items listed as factory stock.

Instructions: Modify price in SWB. Select 'Approval options', add case number, and click 'Submit document'.
Rationale: Corrects purchase order pricing when it differs from supplier quotes.

Instructions: If price is updated on website, send new offer to customer. If price is incorrect on site, open 'Digital issue' ticket.
Rationale: Resolves issues where resale price is less than unit cost.

Instructions: Email delink_and_rematch_invoices@arrow.com with PO/SO details and reason for amendment.
Rationale: Required to amend orders that have already been billed.

Instructions: Determine why supplier shipped without approval, if credit is possible, and if customer must be charged.
Rationale: Establishes financial responsibility for outstanding dropship orders.

Instructions: Create new SO with original info. Set Resale to $0.00, remove freight, and include 3rd party supplier in MFR field.
Rationale: Allows for supplier payment without generating a customer charge or requiring later credits.

Instructions: Place replacement SO on a manual header hold with notes regarding supplier outreach.
Rationale: Prevents the system from erroneously processing the replacement order during coordination.

Instructions: Wait ~30 minutes for the Dropship PO# to generate in SWB under Info > Drop Ship.
Rationale: Ensures the necessary procurement documents are available for matching.

Instructions: Email AP the new dropship PO# (Subject: 'Dropship Order D000000XXXXXX - Please confirm receipt') and CC Sophia Ciarlo.
Rationale: Confirms AP can match the receipt to the PO so the supplier can be paid.

Instructions: Email 3rd party POC marked 'Urgent' to cancel the original PO. CC Sophia Ciarlo.
Rationale: Ensures the erroneous original PO is voided in the supplier's records.

Instructions: For PEI Genesis, message via Teams regarding 5 POs to be cancelled per day during specified periods.
Rationale: Follows specialized communication protocols for specific high-volume suppliers.

Instructions: Search SO in 'Digital Customer' tab on SWB and cross-reference in Salesforce for active cases.
Rationale: Determines if an inquiry is already being handled to reduce redundant tasks.

Instructions: Check 'Ship Lead Time' in IMS when an order is in 'Awaiting Receipt' status and lacks tracking.
Rationale: Provides estimated shipping windows when tracking is not yet available.

Instructions: If lead time/tracking is missing: 1. Find vendor contact in 'Verical Supplier Partner Info'. 2. Email contact using standard inquiry template.
Rationale: Initiates direct communication with vendors to obtain estimated shipping dates.

Instructions: For Reno warehouse orders (V[XX]) with 'Released' or 'Picked' status >2 days: Select 'Sure Ship Domestic - Draft'.
Rationale: Expedites processing for domestic orders that have stalled at the warehouse stage.

Instructions: For Reno cross-dock orders (CDR/CDM) with 'Released' or 'Picked' status >2 days: Select 'Sure Ship International - Draft'.
Rationale: Requests expedited processing for international cross-dock orders.

Instructions: For items in 'Awaiting Receipt' status >3 days: Select 'Receiving Expedite - Draft'.
Rationale: Prompts warehouse to prioritize goods-in processing for delayed shipments.

Instructions: For Hong Kong facility (CDH) in 'Awaiting Receipt' >3 days: Email URGENTRECEIVING.HK@arrowasia.com.
Rationale: Bypasses standard receiving queues at the Hong Kong cross-dock.

Instructions: For Venlo facility (CDV/CDW): Email ecommerce.dlc.emea@arrow.com for Sure Ship or business.support.pdc.emea@arrow.com for Receiving.
Rationale: Provides specialized support for EMEA-based warehouse and logistics issues.

Instructions: For orders shipping from Reno: Select 'Cancel Sales Order - Draft' and complete mandatory fields.
Rationale: Formal request to the warehouse to stop the processing of a sales order.

Instructions: Open ticket if DID is: 'Ready to Release' >24hrs, 'Picked' >7 days, or has a CDQ issue.
Rationale: Resolves technical issues preventing orders from moving to 'Shipped' status.

Instructions: Open ticket for: Blocked User, Orders confirmed but not in Unity, or Pricing/Payment issues.
Rationale: Connects the OMT to IT for web-related access and order import failures.
